Welcome to poker’s documentation!¶

class poker.CardCombo¶

Bases: enum.IntEnum

Here an enum class is created to represent the different values of pokenhands.

class poker.Deck¶

Bases: object

The deck class can be used to create a deck of 52 cards, shuffle the deck and remove the top card of the deck.

class poker.NumberedCard(value, suit)¶

Bases: poker.PlayingCard

In this class the playingcards without a suit are represented.

class poker.PlayerHand¶

Bases: object

The playerhand class can be used to create a player hand. The hand may be given cards, have cards removed, sorted and evaluated for the best poker hand.

class poker.PlayingCard¶

Bases: object

Here a playingcard class is defined to be comparable.

class poker.Suit¶

Bases: enum.Enum

Here an enum class is created to represent the suits.
